text:
Occasionally the PS renderer produces PostScript with syntax errors
in images. This is because the End Of Data tag is being split on two
different lines. I will attach a patch that fixes this problem.
creator: lmoore@providerlink.com

text:
Created attachment 5976
Patch for issue described.
creator: lmoore@providerlink.com

text:
Applied. Thanks a lot for spotting it!

Note to devs: I have also applied the patch to the class in the trunk and I 
even have a JUnit testcase locally. I just can't commit right now because I'm 
still working on something.
creator: jeremias@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
